sentences.en: ...the damage being inflicted on industries by the recession.
sentences.cn: …经济衰退给工业造成的损失。

sentences.en: But then , again, an accustomed eye had likewise its own anguish to inflict.
sentences.cn: 其实, 熟人的目光又何尝不给地带来苦恼!

sentences.en: Detectives warned that the men could inflict serious injury.
sentences.cn: 警探提醒说这些人可能会造成严重伤害。

sentences.en: Don't inflict damage on any person.
Don't inflict your ideas on me.
sentences.cn: 不要把你的想法强加于我.

sentences.en: Having felt pressure from a motherin - law, she didn't want to inflict pressure on anyone else.
sentences.cn: 由于她自知领教过婆婆的压力, 所以她不愿对任何人施加压力.

sentences.en: I am sorry to have to inflict my company upon you.
sentences.cn: 对不起,我不得不打扰你一下.

sentences.en: I tell you I will not spare you the least pang the law can inflict.
sentences.cn: 我告诉你,我决不宽恕你一分一毫,我要尽可能把你依法严办.

sentences.en: I won't inflict myself on you today.
I'm sorry to have to inflict myself upon you.
If war broke out, they could inflict untold losses on mankind.
sentences.cn: 一旦发生战争, 核武器就会给人类带来巨大的损失.

sentences.en: It can destroy tissue and inflict serious harm quite rapidly.
sentences.cn: 它能破坏组织,并且使其遭受十分迅速严重的损伤.

sentences.en: Never inflict useless pain on dumb animals.
sentences.cn: 切勿给不会说话的动物施加无谓的痛苦.

sentences.en: Only the Poland northern group was able to inflict a check upon the German Third Army.
sentences.cn: 只有波兰北部的兵团,能够阻止德国第三集团军的进攻.

sentences.en: The man left the house and did not want to inflict himself upon the happy couple.
sentences.cn: 这个人退出房屋,不想打扰这幸福的一对.

sentences.en: They can inflict an extremely high rate of damage, even against cruisers.
sentences.cn: 它们能造成巨大的破坏作用, 哪怕目标是巡洋舰也是如此.

sentences.en: Who knows what deep psychological wounds you might inflict?
sentences.cn: 麻烦的是,你甚至连大声吼他一顿也是不允许的.

words.tran_cn: 加以打击的；使人难过的

phrases.tran_cn: 使承担（痛苦，负担等）；给以（打击，惩罚等）

trans.tran_cn: 造成；使遭受（损伤、痛苦等）；给予（打击等）
trans.tran_en: To inflict harm or damage on someone or something means to make them suffer it

trans.tran_cn: 把…强加给，使承受，遭受，给予（打击等），处以刑罚，加刑
trans.tran_en: To inflict harm or damage on someone or something means to make them suffer it
